items.sentence: Are you sure that you don't want me to talk to Tom about that?
Tom says that he wants to spend the rest of his life with you.
Why don't you just call Tom and tell him that you can't do it?
I know that the person in the next room is either Tom or Mary.
How do you know that Tom didn't do what he was supposed to do?
Tom dropped his fork on the floor. Please get him a clean one.
I didn't start studying French until I was thirteen years old.
Tom said he didn't have enough money to buy food for everyone.
I said something that I thought was funny, but nobody laughed.
I said something that I thought was funny, but no one laughed.
I think that there are a lot of good-looking men in Australia.
My boyfriend and I have been together for seven years already.
Tom and I were engaged for three months before we got married.
I never used to kiss Tom goodbye in the morning, but I do now.
A strange-looking man came up to me and started talking to me.
The woman sitting next to me on the bus started talking to me.
If you insist on doing it that way, I'm not going to help you.
I spent thirty minutes trying to convince Tom to come with us.
Tom walked up to the stranger and asked him if he needed help.
I walked over to Tom's desk and handed him a pair of scissors.
